properties.entry: SELECT CARD_COM, CARD_PWD, CNUM FROM CARD WHERE USER_NO = ?
INSERT INTO BOOK_ORDER (ORDER_SEQ, BASKET_SEQ, ORDER_DATE, CONFIRMATION_DATE, USER_NO, STATUS) VALUES (SEQ_BONO.NEXTVAL, ?, SYSDATE, SYSDATE + 30, ?,0)
UPDATE BOOK_MASTER SET STOCK = STOCK - ? , SALE_COUNT = SALE_COUNT + ? WHERE BOOK_NO = ?

SELECT O.USER_NO, M.BOOK_NO, ORDER_SEQ, ORDER_DATE, M.TITLE, PRICE, COUNT, O.STATUS, O.CONFIRMATION_DATE FROM BOOK_MASTER M JOIN BASKET B ON (M.BOOK_NO = B.BOOK_NO) JOIN BOOK_ORDER O ON (B.BASKET_SEQ = O.BASKET_SEQ) WHERE O.USER_NO = ? AND O.STATUS IN(0,1) ORDER BY ORDER_DATE DESC, O.STATUS

SELECT O.USER_NO, M.BOOK_NO, ORDER_SEQ, ORDER_DATE, M.TITLE, PRICE, COUNT, O.STATUS, O.CONFIRMATION_DATE FROM BOOK_MASTER M JOIN BASKET B ON (M.BOOK_NO = B.BOOK_NO) JOIN BOOK_ORDER O ON (B.BASKET_SEQ = O.BASKET_SEQ) WHERE O.USER_NO = ? AND O.STATUS IN(0,1) AND TITLE LIKE ? ORDER BY ORDER_DATE DESC, O.STATUS
UPDATE BOOK_ORDER SET STATUS = ?, CANCEL_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE ORDER_SEQ = ?

SELECT O.USER_NO, M.BOOK_NO, ORDER_SEQ, CANCEL_DATE, M.TITLE, PRICE, COUNT, O.STATUS FROM BOOK_MASTER M JOIN BASKET B ON (M.BOOK_NO = B.BOOK_NO) JOIN BOOK_ORDER O ON (B.BASKET_SEQ = O.BASKET_SEQ) WHERE O.USER_NO = ? AND O.STATUS IN(2,3) ORDER BY CANCEL_DATE DESC, O.STATUS
UPDATE BOOK_MASTER SET STOCK = STOCK + ?, SALE_COUNT = SALE_COUNT - ? WHERE BOOK_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM BOOK_MASTER M JOIN BASKET B ON (M.BOOK_NO = B.BOOK_NO) JOIN BOOK_ORDER O ON (B.BASKET_SEQ = O.BASKET_SEQ) WHERE O.USER_NO = ? AND M.BOOK_NO = ? AND O.STATUS IN(0,1)
